review: honestly spend the extra money and get the box....Main reason, remote to stick communication is poor (keep reading). I have the box and NO ISSUES. I got the stick for buddy and we hooked up and found you need to favor the side of the TV the stick is located for remote control to work proper, 60" TV. Makes sense I guess since a big TV is blocking communication? Signal was Strong also to be clear. Maybe it was just us and an odd issue, And no one else has noticed this? but it was an obvious issue in our case... Set up is simple and the good thing about stick is it's convenient to move from TV to TV. Other than that everything works as it should.

review: This by far is the worst streaming device on the market. I have two Roku 3's and s chromecast so when this thing came out on special for $19 I thought I would give it a try but that was the worst $19 spent. I put this on my bedroom tv where my chromecast was working just fine and I can't make it through one movie or tv show without it shutting down saying it can't connect. I had a decent wifi signal to start with so I added a wifi extender to see if that was the problem and now I get almost 50mbps in there and it still shuts off. Get a chromecast instead.
